#summary A description of the menu hierarchy.

= Introduction =

This wiki will describe the menu hierarchy.


= Details =

*Main* menu will have _Options_, _2 Player_, _3 Player_, and _Exit_.

*Options* menu will have _Controls_, _Sound_, and _Back_.

Clicking on *2 Player* or *3 Player* goes to the *Botonoids Select Screen*, complete with 3-d rotating botonoids. This page will have _Back_ and _Next_ buttons.

The *Next* screen has items selections and play are size selection.
